com.easyandroidanimations.library

Class SlideOutAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.easyandroidanimations.library.Animation
      • com.easyandroidanimations.library.SlideOutAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Combinable

    public class SlideOutAnimation
extends Animation
implements Combinable
    This animation causes the view to slide out to the borders of the screen. On animation end, the view is restored to its original state and is set to View.INVISIBLE.
    Author:
    SiYao

      • SlideOutAnimation

        public SlideOutAnimation(View view)
        This animation causes the view to slide out to the borders of the screen. On animation end, the view is restored to its original state and is set to View.INVISIBLE.
        Parameters:
        view - The view to be animated.
